transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan Vikram sir call kiya tha aapne
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan main ye keh raha tha sir
Executive: Ji ji
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir please sir boliye jaise
Customer: Jaise main search karta hoon na jaise maine ek private window khol liya theek hai
Executive: Theek hai
Customer: Hello maine ek private window khol liya
Executive: Ji ab isme maine search kiya stone cladding in Kolkata
Executive: Ek second
Customer: Theek hai sir
Executive: Haan
Customer: Ab isme niche IndiaMART ka portal bhi aa gaya maine IndiaMART ko khol liya
Customer: Ab IndiaMART maine open kiya isme jaise
Customer: Sabhi supplier ke naam aa rahe hain jo Kolkata mein kaam kar raha hai but isme hamara naam kyun nahi aaya
Executive: Haan main bata deta hoon sir pehle main bhi open kar leta hoon ek baar aapne jo dala hai stone wall cladding in Kolkata yahi dala aapne
Customer: Maine stone cladding likha hai sir
Executive: Achcha sirf stone cladding
Executive: Stone wall wall cladding in Kolkata daliye ga agar aap apne jo aapka company ka jo jo keyword hai na exact keyword jo aapne profile mein dala hua hai jaise RNS CLD03010 cladding is type se agar aap dalenge to ye exact keyword se jo na aapki company bhi dikhega visual hoga ab yahan pe kya hota hai ki main aapko do teen point bata deta hoon aapki jo listing hai na actually aapne jo liya hua hai IndiaMART mein wo aapne jo services liye sir wo aapne MDC services liye theek hai to company kya karti hai IndiaMART ki sabse pehle jo jaise aap IndiaMART open kiya hoga aapne to dekha hoga to sabse pehle IndiaMART mein jo first row mein hum log jo dikhate hain sir wo hamara ek leader supplier hota hai second row jo hota hai wo hota hai star supplier ke liye sir third row jo hota hai wo hota hai hamare trusted customer ke liye yani ki pehle star supplier wale dikhenge pehle leader wale aayenge fir second mein jo star supplier fir uske baad trusted aur maximizer dikhenge uske baad aapka number aata hai theek hai wo jitni customer honge pehle unka visual hoga uske baad aapka number aayega sir wahan pe theek hai ke hisab se dikhta hai but agar aap agar exact keyword ji
Customer: Mera to sir naam kahin nahi aa raha hai abhi
Executive: Ji haan aayega aayega main aapko bata deta hoon abhi kaise aayega jaise abhi aapko main dikha raha hoon aapka naam bilkul aayega main aapko dikha deta hoon ab jaise aapko main abhi bhejta hoon ispe whatsapp pe kyun actually kya hota hai match making bhi na exact keyword se hota hai ab jo aapka exact keyword hoga na wo aap type karenge to fir aapka dikhega jaise main aapko mere mere keyword mein to stone cladding bhi diya hua hai sir
Executive: Nahi nahi main aapko bhejta hoon na
Customer: Check kariye
Executive: Main whatsapp pe bhej raha hoon
Executive: Ye dekhiye ye whatsapp pe dekhiye
Customer: To isme main kya karu jo ki wo naam aaye matlab kya keyword change ha keyword matlab mujhe lagta hai sir I don't think aap keyword change kijiye kyuki aapka jo product hai na jo aapne model dala hua hai ye to in sab mein aap kar sakte ho stone wall trading jo hai na wo aapka category hai aur isme bahut sara product dala hua hai RNS to RNS stone hua to abhi sabse pehla ye sir jo hai na aapko ye jyada better rahega kyuki buyer isi name se janta hai nahi jo aapke buyer honge wo to isi name se search karenge na RNS cladding 02 wall cladding isi tarah se unko chahiye jo requirement hoga wo model dalenge hai na sir dekhiye dekhiye yahan pe na thoda sa confusion hai buyer man lijiye ki main ek buyer hoon mujhe stone cladding ghar mein lagana hai
Customer: Theek hai to maine seedha google pe likhunga stone cladding in Kolkata
Executive: Theek hai achcha wo model nahi dalega
Customer: Model pata hi nahi hai na sir stone mein to maine model jis model ka maine naam rakha hai 002 usko koi kuch aur bolta hai model se koi lena dena nahi hai sir ye universal model nahi hai har koi apne hisab se rakhta hai
Executive: Okay to aap ye kar sakte ho na jo common name hota hai na jisse jo common matlab buyer ko jo understood hota hai wo name aap yahan pe fix kar sakte hain mention kar sakte hain jisse aapki visibility jo hai na keyword aapka dikhna start ho jayega
Customer: To usme kya karunga product pe hi sare naam change karu main
Executive: Haan magar wo aap sir ye dekhna ki wo common ho wo search hota ho aisa na ho ki aap agar usme karenge pata chala buyer se jana hai to usme inquiry nahi aayegi wo problem ho jayega hota kya hai ki specially naam wahi hai matlab common name wahi hai stone cladding ya stone elevation tile wahi hota hai common name model number matlab wahan nahi hona chahiye tha aapka kehna sahi hai mujhe lag raha hai
Customer: Okay I understood main samajh gaya sir kya problem hai
Executive: To model category multiple naam aa raha hai to I think isko rehne dijiye sir kyuki inquiry to aa hi rahi hai aur buyer name jo jaise wo ek common name hai uske basis pe aapko aata rahega
Customer: Theek hai main isko dekhta hoon sir
Executive: Wait karta hoon theek hai
Customer: Okay thank you
Executive: Thanks
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's company name not appearing in search results.

Resolution:

- Explained how IndiaMART listing works.

- Suggested using exact keywords for better visibility.

- Suggested using common names for products.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the suggestions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- visibility, keywords, search, listing, products
